text: Toma Zamfir (9 March 1954 - 12 July 2015) was a Romanian footballer who played as a forward. ==Honours== Dinamo București * Divizia A: 1974–75 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:FCM Bacău players Category:AFC Rocar București players
title: Toma Zamfir
